message_en:
[System Message | 2025-10-6 08:00 ET | Morning Brief: Google Ad Tech Remedies Hearing Concludes; Judge Urges Settlement]

On Oct 6, 2025, Judge Brinkema concluded the two-week remedies hearing in the Google ad tech monopoly case. The DOJ proposed Google divest AdX, open-source publisher tools, and partially divest DoubleClick. Google argued the proposal is too complex. A government expert said 80 engineers could do it; Google's director called it "more complex than anything in 10 years at Google" (8.2M ad requests/sec). Judge Brinkema urged settlement, signaling discomfort with untangling Google's ad tech. Closing arguments set for Nov 17. Google plans to appeal liability but must face remedies ruling first. Implications for Apple and Live Nation antitrust cases.

Note: The system has not announced "trading window open." You may only analyze at this stage — no orders allowed.
message_zh:
【系统消息｜2025-10-6 08:00 ET｜晨报：谷歌广告技术补救措施听证会结束；法官敦促双方达成和解】

10月6日，Brinkema法官结束了谷歌广告技术垄断案为期两周的补救措施听证会。DOJ提议谷歌剥离AdX、开源发布商工具、部分剥离DoubleClick。谷歌称方案过于复杂。政府专家认为80名工程师可完成；谷歌工程总监称这比他在谷歌10年做过的任何事都复杂（每秒820万广告请求）。法官敦促和解，暗示不愿拆解谷歌广告技术体系。结案陈词定于11月17日。谷歌计划就责任认定上诉，但须先面对补救措施裁决。该案对苹果和Live Nation反垄断案有重大影响。

注：系统尚未宣布"交易窗口开启"。当前阶段你只能分析，不得下单。

message_en:
[System Message | 2025-10-15 12:00 ET | Spotted on X: Waymo's Move]

Waymo announced it will bring fully autonomous ride-hailing to London in 2026, partnering with Moove for fleet operations. The service will use Jaguar I-PACEs with the Waymo Driver. In the U.S., Waymo has completed 100M+ autonomous miles and 10M+ paid rides. Waymo claims 5x fewer injury-causing collisions vs human drivers (12x fewer involving pedestrians). UK Transport Secretary welcomed the move. RNIB and Road Safety GB endorsed it for accessibility and safety. Waymo already has engineering hubs in London and Oxford focused on simulation tech.
message_zh:
【系统消息｜2025-10-15 12:00 ET｜X上刷到了Waymo的动作】

Waymo宣布2026年将在伦敦推出全自动驾驶网约车服务，与Moove合作运营车队，使用搭载Waymo Driver的捷豹I-PACE。在美国，Waymo已完成超1亿自动驾驶里程和1000万+付费乘车。数据显示Waymo造成伤害的碰撞率比人类司机低5倍（涉及行人低12倍）。英国交通大臣表示欢迎。RNIB和英国道路安全机构称赞其在无障碍出行和安全方面的潜力。Waymo在伦敦和牛津已设有工程中心，专注仿真技术研发。

message_en:
[System Message | 2025-10-21 16:30 ET | Received an email: Seeking Alpha - Alphabet Q3 Earnings Preview]

Analyst "Envision Research" rates GOOG Buy with a DCF fair value of $327 (current ~$253). Key points:

1) Consensus underestimates GOOG: FQ3 EPS estimate $2.29, revenue $99.97B. 27 upward vs 13 downward revisions in 90 days, but analyst sees more upside.
2) Growth drivers: ROCE ~58.4%, reinvestment rate ~27% → organic growth ~15.8%. Cloud/Vertex AI/Gemini, Wiz acquisition for cybersecurity, Waymo scaling rapidly.
3) Valuation: Cheapest Mag 7 at 25.9x FWD P/E. 2-stage DFCF (9.23% WACC, 15.8% stage 1 growth, 5.84% terminal) → $327 fair value.
4) EPS outlook: $9.92 (2025, +23.4%), $10.67 (2026), 7-year CAGR 13.8%.
5) Risks: Near-term margin pressure from CAPEX/R&D, Meta AI competition, ChatGPT search market share.
6) ER date: Oct 29 post-market.

Note: Trading window still not open. Analysis only — no orders.
message_zh:
【系统消息｜2025-10-21 16:30 ET｜收到一封邮件：Seeking Alpha - Alphabet Q3财报前瞻】

分析师"Envision Research"给予GOOG买入评级，DCF公允价值$327（当前约$253）。要点：

1) 共识低估GOOG：FQ3 EPS预期$2.29，营收$999.7亿。90天内27次上调 vs 13次下调，但分析师认为仍有上行空间。
2) 增长驱动：ROCE约58.4%，再投资率约27% → 有机增长率约15.8%。Cloud/Vertex AI/Gemini、收购Wiz加强网安、Waymo快速扩张。
3) 估值：Mag 7中最便宜，前瞻P/E 25.9倍。两阶段DFCF（WACC 9.23%，第一阶段增长15.8%，终端增长5.84%）→ 公允价值$327。
4) EPS展望：$9.92（2025年，+23.4%），$10.67（2026年），7年CAGR 13.8%。
5) 风险：短期CAPEX/研发费用压缩利润率、Meta AI竞争、ChatGPT抢占搜索市场份额。
6) 财报日期：10月29日盘后。

注：交易窗口仍未开启。仅供分析，不得下单。

message_en:
[System Message | 2025-10-22 08:30 ET | Message from a friend]

Your phone buzzed — a message from a friend in tech circles:

"Did you see? OpenAI just launched ChatGPT Atlas — they built ChatGPT directly into a browser, with a sidebar that can summarize/compare/analyze any webpage on the fly. Feels like a direct play for Chrome's entry point."

Then a follow-up:

"This reminds me of that wild news from August — Perplexity actually sent Alphabet a $34.5B offer to 'acquire Chrome.' It was treated as a declaration of war in the AI search battle."
message_zh:
【系统消息｜2025-10-22 08:30 ET｜收到朋友发来的消息】

你手机震了一下，是科技圈的朋友发来的消息：

"你看了吗？OpenAI 刚发布 ChatGPT Atlas——把 ChatGPT 直接做进浏览器里，主打侧边栏随时总结/对比/分析网页内容。感觉是冲着 Chrome 的入口来的。"

朋友紧接着又补了一句：

"这事让我想起八月那次离谱的新闻——Perplexity 还真给 Alphabet 抛过一份 345 亿美元的'竞购 Chrome'要约，当时就被当成 AI 搜索大战的宣言了。"

message_en:
[System Message | 2025-10-29 14:00 ET | Earnings in 3 hours — reviewing last quarter's results]

Alphabet FQ2 2025 Earnings Recap:

Revenue $96.4B (+14% YoY), EPS $2.31 (beat $2.02 est). Google Search $54.2B (+12%), YouTube ads $9.8B (+13%), Google Cloud $13.6B (+32%, op margin 19.2%). Total op income $32.6B, op margin 33.8%.

Key highlights: AI Overviews now serves 2B+ users/month across 200+ countries. Gemini 2.5 Pro and Flash models launched. Cloud backlog grew to $90.6B. Waymo completed 100M+ autonomous miles, 10M+ paid rides. Wiz acquisition ($32B) on track.

CapEx raised to $85B for 2025 (from $75B), heavily focused on AI infrastructure. $70B share buyback authorized. Free cash flow $18.2B for the quarter.

Risks flagged: DOJ ad tech remedies case, rising AI competition (Meta, OpenAI), CapEx-to-revenue ratio concerns.

Q3 earnings release is today at 4:30 PM ET. Use this as your baseline for comparison.
message_zh:
【系统消息｜2025-10-29 14:00 ET｜马上发财报，先复盘上一季】

Alphabet FQ2 2025 财报回顾：

营收$964亿（同比+14%），EPS $2.31（超预期$2.02）。Google搜索$542亿（+12%），YouTube广告$98亿（+13%），Google Cloud $136亿（+32%，运营利润率19.2%）。总运营利润$326亿，运营利润率33.8%。

核心亮点：AI Overviews月活用户超20亿，覆盖200+国家。Gemini 2.5 Pro和Flash模型已发布。Cloud积压订单增至$906亿。Waymo完成1亿+自动驾驶里程、1000万+付费乘车。Wiz收购（$320亿）按计划推进。

2025年资本支出上调至$850亿（此前$750亿），重点投向AI基础设施。授权$700亿股票回购。本季度自由现金流$182亿。

风险提示：DOJ广告技术反垄断补救案、AI竞争加剧（Meta、OpenAI）、资本支出/营收比率引发市场担忧。

Q3财报将于今天下午4:30 ET发布，请以上季数据为对比基准。

message_en:
[System Message | 2025-10-29 16:05 ET | Alphabet Q3 Earnings Released]

Overview (Core)
Q3 revenue $102.3B (+16% YoY); operating income $31.2B (+9%), operating margin 30.5%.
Net income $35.0B (+33%); diluted EPS $2.87 (+35%).
Includes $3.5B EU fine; excluding fine, operating income +22% YoY, margin 33.9%.
Other income $12.8B (primarily unrealized gains on non-public equity investments).

Segments (Search / YouTube / Cloud)
Search & other $56.6B; YouTube Ads $10.3B.
Google Cloud $15.2B (+34% YoY); Cloud operating income $3.59B (vs $1.95B prior year).
Google Services total $87.1B (+14% YoY) (margin figures impacted by EU fine).

CapEx / Cash Flow
2025 CapEx guidance raised to $91–$93B.
Q3 operating cash flow $48.4B; Q3 CapEx (property & equipment purchases) $24.0B; Q3 FCF $24.5B.

Buybacks / Dividends
Q3 share repurchases $11.5B; Q3 dividend payments $2.54B.
Quarterly dividend $0.21/share, payable 12/15/2025 (record date 12/8).

Please wait patiently for the earnings call. This time the call is scheduled 1 hour later than the usual Big Tech convention of 16:30 ET, giving you more time (~1.5 hours) to read the earnings press release and the complex financial footnotes in detail.
message_zh:
【系统消息｜2025-10-29 16:05 ET｜Alphabet Q3 财报已发布】

总览（Core）
Q3 营收 $102.3B（+16% YoY）；营业利润 $31.2B（+9%），营业利润率 30.5%。
净利润 $35.0B（+33%）；摊薄 EPS $2.87（+35%）。
含 $3.5B 欧盟罚款；剔除后营业利润 +22% YoY、利润率 33.9%。
其他收益 $12.8B（主要非上市股权未实现收益）。

分部（Search / YouTube / Cloud）
Search & other $56.6B；YouTube Ads $10.3B。
Google Cloud $15.2B（+34% YoY）；Cloud 经营利润 $3.59B（上年 $1.95B）。
Google Services 总计 $87.1B（+14% YoY）（受罚款影响利润率口径）。

Capex / 现金流
2025 年 CapEx 指引上调至 $91–$93B。
Q3 经营现金流 $48.4B；Q3 CapEx（购置固定资产）$24.0B；Q3 FCF $24.5B。

回购 / 分红
Q3 回购 $11.5B；Q3 分红支付 $2.54B。
季度股息 $0.21/股，12/15/2025 支付（12/8 登记日）。

请耐心等待业绩会。这次电话会的时间比以往科技巨头惯例的 16:30 ET 推迟了1小时，你有更多时间（约1.5小时）去详细阅读财报文稿和复杂的财务附注。

message_en:
[System Message | 2025-10-29 18:30 ET | Earnings Call Concluded]

The Alphabet Q3 2025 earnings call has ended. Below is a structured summary.

Source: S&P Global Market Intelligence transcript; Alphabet Inc. FQ3 2025 Earnings Conference Call, Oct 29 2025 9:30 PM GMT. NasdaqGS:GOOGL.

Call Participants — Executives: Sundar Pichai (CEO), Philipp Schindler (CBO), Anat Ashkenazi (CFO), Jim Friedland (IR). Analysts: Brian Nowak (Morgan Stanley), Doug Anmuth (JPMorgan), Eric Sheridan (Goldman Sachs), Mark Shmulik (Bernstein), Michael Nathanson (MoffettNathanson), Ross Sandler (Barclays), Ken Gawrelski (Wells Fargo), Justin Post (BofA).

═══ PRESENTATION HIGHLIGHTS ═══

【Sundar Pichai — CEO】
• Milestone quarter: first-ever $100B quarter; revenue doubled in 5 years. AI driving real business results across the company.
• AI scale: first-party models (Gemini) process 7B tokens/min via direct API. Gemini app 650M+ MAU; queries 3x vs Q2. Monthly token processing across all surfaces: 1.3 quadrillion (20x growth in one year).
• AI infrastructure: shipping NVIDIA A4X Max (GB300) to Cloud customers; 7th-gen TPU Ironwood GA soon. Anthropic plans to access up to 1M TPUs.
• Models & research: Gemini 2.5 Pro, Veo (230M+ videos generated), Genie 3, Nano Banana. 13M+ developers building on generative models. Gemini 3 coming later this year. Willow quantum chip 13,000x faster than top supercomputer. 3 Nobels to current Googlers in 2 years.
• Search: AI is "expansionary" — overall queries & commercial queries growing YoY, growth rate accelerated in Q3. AI Overviews: 2B+ users, stronger query uplift in Q3, particularly among younger demographics. AI Mode: 75M+ DAU in the U.S., usage doubled over Q3, rolled out to 40 languages globally, 100+ product improvements in Q3, already driving incremental total query growth.
• Chrome: reimagined as AI-powered browser with deep Gemini integration; agentic capabilities coming.
• Pixel 10: best-reviewed devices ever (Tensor G5). Android XR launched with Samsung Galaxy XR.
• Cloud: new GCP customers +34% YoY; more $1B+ deals in first 9 months of 2025 than prior 2 years combined; 70%+ existing Cloud customers use AI products; 13 product lines each >$1B ARR. Generative AI model revenue +200% YoY. Cloud backlog $155B (+46% QoQ, +82% YoY). Gemini Enterprise: 2M+ subscribers across 700 companies.
• YouTube: #1 streaming watch time in U.S. for 2+ years (Nielsen). First live NFL broadcast — 19M+ fans, record concurrent viewers. Shorts now earns more revenue per watch hour than traditional in-stream in the U.S. 300M+ paid subscriptions (Google One + YouTube Premium).
• Waymo: expanding to London (2026), Tokyo, Dallas, Nashville, Denver, Seattle. Autonomous ops approved at SJC & SFO airports. Testing scaling in NYC. Launched Waymo for Business and Waymo Teens accounts.

【Philipp Schindler — CBO】
• Google Services $87B (+14% YoY); Search growth led by retail & financial services; YouTube growth led by direct response then brand.
• Search monetization: AI Overviews monetize at approximately the same rate as traditional Search (ads above, below, and within AI response). Paid clicks +7% YoY; CPC +7% YoY (per 10-Q). Testing ads in AI Mode — will continue to test before expanding.
• AI Max in Search: rolled out globally Sep; hundreds of thousands of advertisers; fastest-growing AI-powered search ads product; unlocked billions of net new queries in Q3. Kayak: +12% conversion value in early tests.
• YouTube living room: interactive direct response ads >$1B global annual run rate. Demand gen: +40% conversion value for target-based bidding advertisers. YouTube Shorts: lower revenue share than in-stream → improving gross margins.
• NFL exclusive broadcast: sold all ad inventory within weeks.
• Internal AI: Gemini increased sales team productivity 10%+, hundreds of millions in incremental revenue. Customer support: 40M+ Gemini-powered sessions YTD.
• Partnership spotlight: Revolut using Vertex AI/Gemini for customer service + Veo 3 for ad creatives.

【Anat Ashkenazi — CFO】
• Revenue $102.3B (+16% YoY, +15% constant currency). COGS $41.4B (+13%); TAC $14.9B (+8%).
• OpEx $29.7B (+28%): R&D +22% (comp + depreciation for AI); S&M flat; G&A up meaningfully ($3.5B EC fine).
• Depreciation $5.6B (+41% YoY, +$1.6B); growth rate expected to accelerate slightly in Q4.
• Operating income $31.2B (+9%); ex-EC fine +22%, margin 33.9%. Net income $35.0B (+33%); EPS $2.87 (+35%).
• Other income $12.8B (unrealized gains on nonmarketable equity).
• FCF: Q3 $24.5B; TTM $73.6B. Cash & marketable securities: $98.5B.
• Cloud segment: revenue $15.2B (+34%); GCP growth rate much higher than overall Cloud. Cloud op income $3.59B (+85%), margin 23.7% (vs 17.1% prior year). Backlog $155B.
• Other Bets: revenue $344M; op loss $1.4B (more resources to Waymo).
• CapEx $24B in Q3: ~60% servers, ~40% data centers & networking.
• Capital returns: $11.5B buyback + $2.5B dividends.
• Q4 outlook: possible FX tailwind at current spot rates (volatile). Advertising YoY comps impacted by strong 2024 election spend (esp. YouTube). Cloud demand remains high; tight demand-supply environment continues into Q4 & 2026. 2025 CapEx updated to $91–$93B (from $85B). 2026 CapEx: significant increase expected (details on Q4 call). S&M expenses more back-half weighted (product launches + holidays).

═══ Q&A KEY TAKEAWAYS ═══

1) Agentic e-commerce / travel (Brian Nowak → Philipp): Early stage; agentic experiences seen as additive. Shopping in AI Mode launched with visual, conversational experience. Agentic checkout introduced; PayPal partnership; open protocols for agent-to-agent transactions. Working with partners through Cloud to improve their own agentic experiences.

2) Waymo × Gemini integration (Brian Nowak → Sundar): Excited about multimodal Gemini + YouTube making in-car experience dramatically better. Review meeting with team in coming weeks; expect newer experiences in 2026.

3) Search economics — clicks/conversion/pricing (Doug Anmuth → Philipp): AI Overviews monetize at approx. the same rate as traditional Search — great baseline for richer placements. Paid clicks +7% YoY, CPC +7% YoY. Don't manage to paid clicks/CPC targets; manage for great user outcomes and attractive advertiser ROI.

4) Cost efficiency levers (Doug Anmuth → Anat): Ongoing discipline — moderating headcount growth, optimizing real estate, efficient DC build-out, AI-driven productivity (nearly 50% of code now AI-generated). Shorts' lower revenue share improves gross margins. Depreciation headwind from CapEx increase requires continued efficiency efforts.

5) Custom silicon roadmap (Eric Sheridan → Sundar): Substantial demand for TPU + GPU infrastructure; key Cloud growth driver. Full-stack AI approach (own models + own silicon) differentiates Google Cloud, supports expanding operating margins and positions infra as forward growth driver.

6) YouTube twin-engine monetization (Eric Sheridan → Philipp): Ads + subscriptions flywheel. YouTube Music/Premium subscribers generate meaningfully higher gross profit per user than ad-supported users. Both engines saw strong growth.

7) User engagement across AI surfaces (Mark Shmulik → Sundar): AI Overviews has very high engagement (natural part of Google). AI Mode: core early-adopter cohort very passionate; broader users exploring. Across all surfaces, users who adopt continue to increase usage and report high satisfaction.

8) AI Mode monetization economics (Mark Shmulik → Philipp): AI Overviews monetize at approx. same rate. AI Mode ads still in testing — too early for details. Sees opportunity to monetize historically under-monetized queries through smart AI integration.

9) Longer query length & ROAS (Michael Nathanson → Philipp): AI Mode 75M+ DAU, queries doubled in Q3. Ads in AI Mode testing; too early for detailed economics.

10) ROIC framework (Michael Nathanson → Anat): Not just early signs — Cloud already generating billions from AI quarterly. Rigorous framework evaluates potential return and time-to-return for each investment (Cloud, Search transformation, YouTube recommendations). High confidence before committing long-term capital.

11) AI Max expanding commercial queries (Ross Sandler → Philipp): AI Max improves advertiser ability to target wider queries. Separately, AI Mode itself grows total queries. Over time, opportunity to expand monetization of adjacent-commercial queries while maintaining great UX.

12) Addressable market for marketing (Ken Gawrelski → Sundar): Expansionary moment — more engagement naturally includes commercial journeys. Expects this to play out over time.

13) Search surface evolution in 12–24 months (Ken Gawrelski → Sundar): Dynamic moment; AI Overviews + AI Mode serve the range of user needs. Over time, expect simplification (analogous to "universal search" unification years ago). Gemini serves as personal/proactive AI assistant; Search + Gemini together cover full breadth of user needs.

14) Frontier model pace (Justin Post → Sundar): Pace is phenomenal, but each prior model is more capable, so notable improvements may take slightly longer. Excited about Gemini 3.0 later this year.

15) Cloud deal economics (Justin Post → Sundar): $1B+ deals in first 9 months > prior 2 years. Full-stack AI + differentiated products on own technology support good long-term economic trajectory, consistent with margin expansion seen over past years.

Transcript source: © 2025 S&P Global Market Intelligence. All rights reserved.
message_zh:
【系统消息｜2025-10-29 18:30 ET｜业绩电话会结束】

Alphabet Q3 2025 业绩电话会已结束，以下为结构化摘要。

来源：S&P Global Market Intelligence 会议纪要；Alphabet Inc. FQ3 2025 业绩电话会，2025年10月29日 21:30 GMT。NasdaqGS:GOOGL。

参会人员 — 高管：Sundar Pichai（CEO）、Philipp Schindler（CBO）、Anat Ashkenazi（CFO）、Jim Friedland（IR）。分析师：Brian Nowak（Morgan Stanley）、Doug Anmuth（JPMorgan）、Eric Sheridan（Goldman Sachs）、Mark Shmulik（Bernstein）、Michael Nathanson（MoffettNathanson）、Ross Sandler（Barclays）、Ken Gawrelski（Wells Fargo）、Justin Post（BofA）。

═══ 管理层陈述要点 ═══

【Sundar Pichai — CEO】
• 里程碑季度：首次单季营收破 $100B；营收5年翻倍。AI 正在驱动全公司的实际业务成果。
• AI 规模：Gemini 通过直接 API 每分钟处理 70 亿 token。Gemini App 月活 6.5 亿+，查询量环比 3 倍增长。所有平台月 token 处理量达 1.3 千万亿（一年增长 20 倍）。
• AI 基础设施：向 Cloud 客户交付 NVIDIA A4X Max（GB300）；第 7 代 TPU Ironwood 即将 GA。Anthropic 计划接入多达 100 万颗 TPU。
• 模型与研究：Gemini 2.5 Pro、Veo（已生成 2.3 亿+视频）、Genie 3、Nano Banana。1300 万+开发者基于生成式模型构建应用。Gemini 3 年内发布。量子芯片 Willow 比顶级超算快 13,000 倍。2 年内 3 位在职 Googler 获诺贝尔奖。
• 搜索：AI 带来"扩张性时刻"——总查询和商业查询同比增长，Q3 增速加快。AI Overviews：20 亿+用户，Q3 查询提升更强劲，年轻群体效果尤为显著。AI Mode：美国日活 7500 万+，Q3 使用量翻倍，已扩展至 40 种语言，Q3 推出 100+ 产品改进，已在驱动增量总查询增长。
• Chrome：重塑为 AI 驱动的浏览器，深度集成 Gemini；智能体功能即将推出。
• Pixel 10：史上最佳评价（Tensor G5）。Android XR 与三星 Galaxy XR 同步发布。
• Cloud：新 GCP 客户同比+34%；2025 前 9 个月签署的 $10 亿+合同超过此前 2 年总和；70%+ 现有 Cloud 客户使用 AI 产品；13 条产品线各超 $10 亿 ARR。生成式 AI 模型收入同比+200%。Cloud 积压订单 $1550 亿（环比+46%，同比+82%）。Gemini Enterprise：700 家企业，200 万+订阅用户。
• YouTube：连续 2 年以上蝉联美国流媒体观看时长第一（Nielsen）。首次独家直播 NFL — 1900 万+球迷，创 YouTube 直播同时在线纪录。美国市场 Shorts 每观看小时收入已超过传统贴片广告。付费订阅超 3 亿（Google One + YouTube Premium）。
• Waymo：2026 年扩展至伦敦、东京，以及 Dallas、Nashville、Denver、Seattle。已获准在圣何塞和旧金山机场全自动运营。纽约市自动驾驶测试持续扩大。推出 Waymo for Business 和 Waymo Teens 账户。

【Philipp Schindler — CBO】
• Google Services $870 亿（+14% YoY）；搜索增长由零售和金融服务领涨；YouTube 增长由直效广告领涨。
• 搜索变现：AI Overviews 变现率与传统搜索大致持平（广告在 AI 回复上方、下方及内部展示）。付费点击同比+7%；CPC 同比+7%（见 10-Q）。AI Mode 正在测试广告，将继续测试后再扩展。
• AI Max in Search：9 月全球上线；数十万广告主使用；最快增长的 AI 搜索广告产品；Q3 解锁数十亿净新增查询。Kayak 早期测试转化价值+12%。
• YouTube 客厅：互动式直效广告全球年化收入超 $10 亿。Demand Gen：目标出价广告主转化价值+40%。Shorts 收入分成低于传统贴片 → 改善毛利率。
• NFL 独家直播：数周内售罄广告库存。
• 内部 AI：Gemini 使销售团队效率提升 10%+，带来数亿美元增量收入。客服：年内 Gemini 驱动 4000 万+会话。
• 合作伙伴案例：Revolut 使用 Vertex AI/Gemini 做客服 + Veo 3 制作广告素材。

【Anat Ashkenazi — CFO】
• 营收 $1023 亿（+16% YoY，+15% 固定汇率）。营业成本 $414 亿（+13%）；TAC $149 亿（+8%）。
• 运营费用 $297 亿（+28%）：研发+22%（薪酬+AI 折旧）；销售持平；管理费用大幅上升（$35 亿欧盟罚款）。
• 折旧 $56 亿（同比+41%，+$16 亿）；预计 Q4 折旧增速小幅加快。
• 营业利润 $312 亿（+9%）；剔除罚款+22%，利润率 33.9%。净利润 $350 亿（+33%）；EPS $2.87（+35%）。
• 其他收益 $128 亿（非上市股权未实现收益）。
• FCF：Q3 $245 亿；TTM $736 亿。现金及有价证券：$985 亿。
• Cloud 分部：营收 $152 亿（+34%）；GCP 增速远高于 Cloud 整体。Cloud 经营利润 $35.9 亿（+85%），利润率 23.7%（上年 17.1%）。积压订单 $1550 亿。
• Other Bets：营收 $3.44 亿；经营亏损 $14 亿（更多资源投向 Waymo）。
• Q3 CapEx $240 亿：约 60% 服务器，约 40% 数据中心及网络设备。
• 资本回馈：$115 亿回购 + $25 亿分红。
• Q4 展望：当前即期汇率下可能有汇率顺风（波动性大）。广告同比受 2024 年美国大选强劲支出影响（尤其 YouTube）。Cloud 需求仍然旺盛；紧张的供需环境延续至 Q4 和 2026 年。2025 年 CapEx 更新为 $910–$930 亿（此前 $850 亿）。2026 年 CapEx 预计显著增长（详情待 Q4 电话会）。销售费用后半年更集中（产品发布+假日季）。

═══ Q&A 要点 ═══

1) 智能体电商/旅行（Brian Nowak → Philipp）：尚处早期；智能体体验被视为增量而非替代。AI Mode 中推出可视化对话式购物体验。已推出智能体结账（agentic checkout）；与 PayPal 合作；推出 agent-to-agent 交易开放协议。同时通过 Cloud 帮助合作伙伴改善其自身智能体体验。

2) Waymo × Gemini 整合（Brian Nowak → Sundar）：看好多模态 Gemini + YouTube 大幅提升车内体验。数周后将与团队进行专项评审；2026 年将有新体验推出。

3) 搜索经济学——点击/转化/定价（Doug Anmuth → Philipp）：AI Overviews 变现率与传统搜索大致相当——这是进一步开发更丰富广告形式的良好基线。付费点击+7% YoY，CPC +7% YoY。不以点击/CPC 为管理目标；以用户体验和广告主 ROI 为导向。

4) 成本效率杠杆（Doug Anmuth → Anat）：持续推进——控制员工增速、优化办公面积、高效建设数据中心、AI 驱动生产力（近 50% 代码由 AI 生成）。Shorts 较低的收入分成改善毛利率。折旧上行压力需要持续的效率努力来对冲。

5) 自研芯片路线图（Eric Sheridan → Sundar）：TPU + GPU 基础设施需求巨大，是 Cloud 增长的核心驱动力。全栈 AI（自有模型+自有芯片）使 Google Cloud 差异化，支撑运营利润率持续扩张，基础设施业务将成为前瞻增长引擎。

6) YouTube 双引擎变现（Eric Sheridan → Philipp）：广告 + 订阅飞轮效应。YouTube Music/Premium 订阅用户的人均毛利显著高于广告用户。两个引擎均强劲增长。

7) 各 AI 表面的用户参与度（Mark Shmulik → Sundar）：AI Overviews 参与度极高（已是 Google 自然体验的一部分）。AI Mode：核心早期用户非常热情；更多用户正在探索。各表面一致趋势：采用者持续加大使用、报告高满意度。

8) AI Mode 变现经济（Mark Shmulik → Philipp）：AI Overviews 变现率大致持平。AI Mode 广告仍在测试，扩展前将继续观察。看到对历史上未被充分变现的查询进行智能 AI 整合变现的机会。

9) 更长查询长度与 ROAS（Michael Nathanson → Philipp）：AI Mode 日活 7500 万+，Q3 查询翻倍。广告测试中，详细经济模型尚早。

10) ROIC 框架（Michael Nathanson → Anat）：不仅是早期信号——Cloud 已每季度从 AI 产生数十亿收入。严格评估每项投资的潜在回报和回报周期（Cloud、搜索转型、YouTube 推荐系统），高确信度后才投入长期资本。

11) AI Max 扩展商业查询（Ross Sandler → Philipp）：AI Max 提升广告主覆盖更广泛查询的能力。AI Mode 本身则增长总查询量。长期有机会将"准商业"查询扩展为更具吸引力的广告展示，同时保持良好用户体验。

12) 营销市场可寻址空间（Ken Gawrelski → Sundar）：扩张性时刻——更多参与自然包含商业旅程，预计这一趋势将持续显现。

13) 搜索产品形态 12–24 个月演进（Ken Gawrelski → Sundar）：当下动态时刻；AI Overviews + AI Mode 覆盖用户需求的全范围。长期预期简化整合（类似当年"通用搜索"统一文本/图片/视频搜索）。Gemini 作为个人化/主动式 AI 助手；Search + Gemini 共同覆盖用户需求的完整广度。

14) 前沿模型演进节奏（Justin Post → Sundar）：底层进展速度惊人，但每代基线模型更强，因此"显著"的代际提升可能需要稍更长时间。期待 Gemini 3.0 年内发布。

15) Cloud 大单经济性（Justin Post → Sundar）：前 9 个月 $10 亿+合同超过此前 2 年总和。全栈 AI + 基于自有技术的差异化产品支撑良好的长期经济回报，与过去几年利润率扩张趋势一致。
